description: The skill will pull the latest closing day price and date for gold and silver and speak the price and date in response.  No special requirements are needed.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Gold Bug what's the price of (gold/silver)
Alexa, ask Gold Bug what is the price of (gold/silver)
Alexa, ask Gold Bug for the (gold/silver) price
name: Gold Bug
shortDescription: Get the latest closing day prices for gold and silver with Gold Bug!
